name: Advanced Ceramics
credits: 3 to 6; can be repeated with change in content (Majors - 6 credits; Elective - 3 or 6 credits); Prereq: ART 3762C, ART 3764C, ART 3768C and ART 3784C
description: Focuses on advanced technical and creative concepts with emphasis on developing personal work and professional practices preparation.
